name: Tome of Fates
description:
DISCLAIMER - the Early access version currently has only one story.

      Tome of Fates is a text-based interactive RPG that allows the Player(s) to choose their own path, with each choice affecting the story in unique ways. Select and enjoy a wide variety of adventures through the eyes of diverse, unique heroes.

  • MULTIPLAYER - Co-op / Twitch viewer interaction

Don't want to play alone? Our unique CO-OP system allows you and your chosen friends to vote on the path the story takes and what choices to make. Bit of a streamer? Use our Twitch Integration system to allow viewers to join in on the fun and influence your story!

  • STORIES - A story for everyone

    DISCLAIMER - the Early access version currently has only one story.
Immerse yourself in our collection of captivating tales that span a range of genres, that will include historical fantasy, high fantasy, sci-fi, and more. Each story offers a unique and engaging experience.
Fresh narratives arriving every quarter, enriching our selection with new and exciting tales to explore.

  • REPEATABILITY - Your Choice

Multiple heroes to select from. Every decision you make has an impact, and every path taken will have its own rewards and risks. Explore the unknown and let the choices you make create YOUR fate!

  • WORKSHOP - Create your own adventure

Select a story from the Workshop or use the in-game Editor to create your own Story! The Editor allows Players to create a story through well-thought-out interest points, fully designable heroes, manage monsters along with their stats and abilities, customize the inventory and slots, and much much more!
